channel.title: Matrix (I know there's a lot of topics on this) character edits help
channel.description:
So I'm browsing the Matrix (Disturbed) server files and run along the character save section located in data/characters. The format is a .p file. Now knowing the bit of coding language that I do, that's a pascal file type. Yet I cannot find software that will comply and open this file without some sort of fail.
Does anyone know how to un-encrypt this file, or at lease have working software that can read this.

item.title: Matrix (I know there's a lot of topics on this) character edits help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

it definitely is a real file extension.

http://www.fileinfo.com/extension/p

Anyways, what script would I use then.

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix (I know there's a lot of topics on this) character edits help

item.title: Matrix (I know there's a lot of topics on this) character edits help
item.dc:creator: @Deus1993 Deus1993
item.description:
@Deus1993 wrote:

It’s not a real file extension -.-

You can’t physically edit them without running a script.

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix (I know there's a lot of topics on this) character edits help
